title: Leadale no Daichi nite
title_jp: リアデイルの大地にて
synopsis:
The previously bedridden Keina Kagami finds herself in the world of her favorite VRMMORPG—titled Leadale—after the life support keeping her alive fails. Reincarnated in the body of her high-level character, "Cayna," she notices that the world of Leadale is different from what she remembers playing.

As she comes to learn, two hundred years have passed since she last interacted with the world. However, this does not sadden Cayna—as it means that a new journey awaits her, filled with exciting prospects and unfamiliar faces all waiting to be discovered.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

episodes.nome: An Inn, a Tower, a Bear, and a Banquet
An Injured Man, the Royal Capital, and a Game of Tag with Sons
A Daughter, a Colosseum, Losing Control, and an Uppercut
A Son, a Fight, a Journey, and Bandits
A Grandson, a Granddaughter, a Great-Grandson, and a Fortress
Rock Golems, a Chief, Skeletons, and Fairies
Bear Hunting, a Queen, a Bath, and Monsters
A Battle, a Victory, a Conversation, and Information
Another Visit, a Mermaid, a Misunderstanding, and Zombies
A Butler, a Ghost Ship, a Ward, and the Palace of the Dragon King
An Introduction, a Carriage, a Maid, and Moving
Relocating, Building, Flying, and the Earth
